product_overview: Inquiry Board Application is a React-based customer support platform that allows users to post inquiries, view inquiry details with optional privacy, and enables admin management features such as replying and deleting inquiries. It includes an animated intro overlay and smooth UI interactions using TailwindCSS and Framer Motion.
core_goals: Provide an easy-to-use inquiry posting platform for users.
Support secret (private) inquiries that require password authentication for access.
Enable admin users to manage inquiries by replying and deleting posts.
Ensure smooth onboarding experience with animated intro overlay.
Maintain responsive design that adapts to desktop and mobile layouts.
Improve UX by replacing native dialogs with custom modal components.
Facilitate seamless navigation between main landing page and inquiry board overlay.
key_features: Animated IntroOverlay that displays before the main content and animates out smoothly.
InquiryBoard component supporting creating, reading, replying, and deleting inquiries.
Support for secret inquiries requiring password input for access by normal users, with admin bypass capabilities.
Admin toggle feature to switch between admin and normal user modes for management.
Form validation and immediate UI updates when posting new inquiries.
Responsive layout that splits inquiry list and detail on desktop and stacks on mobile devices.
Proper layering using z-index for overlays, navigation, and modals.
Smooth animations handled by Framer Motion's AnimatePresence for component mount and unmount.
Backend interaction simulated via json-server with mock data stored in db.json.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the app and views the IntroOverlay animation.
User clicks '고객 문의' to open the InquiryBoard overlay.
For new inquiries, user clicks '문의하기' to open a form, fills in details including optional secret toggle, and submits.
User sees the inquiry list updated with their new post at the top.
User clicks on any inquiry item: if secret, normal user is prompted for password, admin users can view directly.
If password entered is correct, user can view inquiry details including replies.
Admin users can toggle admin mode ON/OFF and can reply to inquiries or delete them.
User closes the InquiryBoard overlay by clicking the close button to return to the main landing page.
validation_criteria: Inquiry creation updates list immediately and clears form fields.
Secret inquiries prompt for password and validate correctly; admin bypass works.
Admin features (reply, delete) modify the list correctly and show badges.
IntroOverlay animates and disappears on page load.
InquiryBoard overlays above all other content with correct z-index stacking.
Responsive design verified on desktop and mobile viewport sizes.
Native alert, confirm, and prompt replaced with custom modal dialogs (planned).
No console errors such as React key warnings or invalid DOM props.
Network requests to backend endpoint /inquiries return status 200 and data consistent with UI.
Proper handling of overflow in inquiry list container with smooth scrolling.
